entry.title: "Do You Ever Let Yourself Live?"
entry.summary:
Author: ReiWayne

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,091Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 28

Summary: â€œDo you ever let yourself live?â€ Not survive. Not function. Live. Bruce told himself that the pills were for the pain.But after a hostage crisis and a new strain of fear toxin, everything starts slipping, and Clark sees more than he's supposed to; more than Bruce knows how to give.Because letting someone close means letting them see the damage, and Bruce isn't sure what's left of him underneath.Clark would stay anyway.

entry.title: one day i am gonna grow wings (this is how it feels to take the fall)
entry.summary:
Author: no_imnotafraidtodisappear

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,452Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 59

Summary: Neil Josten wasnâ€™t stupid.Neil Josten knew how to nurse himself back to health after that night in January. He made his own suits, he made his own webs. Neil Josten put his life back together piece by piece, all by himself.Neil Josten had survived.Even so Neil Josten knew he shouldâ€™ve kept running. Neil Josten shouldâ€™ve known his time was running out. Neil Josten shouldâ€™ve heeded his motherâ€™s advice instead of sticking out like a sore thumb, even with his mask on.No, Neil Josten wasnâ€™t stupid. Neil Josten was dumb.â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”Neil is Spider-man. Dies, and then gets revived. He is now in New Jerseyâ€¦ in another universe. A lot of problems arise.Please mind the tags. There will be some graphic stuff. I try to put TWs at the beginning of the chapter, though. You have been warned.Â this fic is inspired by both of these fics:Hope Was A Dangerous, Disquieting Thing by BisexualChaosDemonLeap of Faith by alighterwood and ErinWantsToWrite

entry.summary:
Author: NoodleDragon324

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,234Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

entry.title: We Could Be Heroes - A SuperBat Love Story
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 88,994Chapters: 32/?Kudos: 175

Summary: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent both maintain a strong sense of justice and fight for peace in their respective cities. However, both are struggling to maintain order alone, and are weighed down by a lost sense of identity and the loneliness that stems from the isolation of living a double life. After a chance encounter, the pair agree to form a Justice League to address the growing threat to Earth's security. As they learn to work together, new feelings blossom, and the heroes soon find themselves leaning on each other for support and comfort.Slow-burn romance. Bat-family drama. Justice League shenanigans. Bruce being a rich kid with issues. Superman being an innocent lad.Heavily inspired by Batman/Superman The Animated Series, Justice League, and Justice League Unlimited. Also takes inspiration from The Batman (2022), My Adventures With Superman (2023), Batman: Caped Crusader (2024), Smallville (2001), Batman (1966), and various comics, including the World's Finest and Public Enemies series.

entry.summary:
Author: battinscnz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,931Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 96

Summary: Bruce Wayne is no stranger to the spotlightâ€”or the shadows it casts. Reclusive, haunted by tragedy, and heir to a name that carries more weight than comfort, he now faces something far more personal than public scrutiny: a stalker. The letters arrive like clockworkâ€”taunting, obsessive, familiar. And with Halloween approachingâ€”the anniversary of his parents' deathâ€”the tension coils tighter.Clark Kent is a disciplined, quietly intense MMA-trained security specialist, brought in under General Sam Laneâ€™s orders to keep Bruce safe. He expects a job. He doesnâ€™t expect the gothic cold of Wayne Manor, the brooding silence of its only resident, or the unsettling depth of what Bruce refuses to say out loud.But as danger creeps closer, and the mystery surrounding the stalker sharpens, Bruce and Clark are forced into uncomfortable proximity. What begins as resistance slowly becomes something deeperâ€”something fragile and real.

Summary: Three years after the battle with Bane a tragedy accuses on the invasion of Zod which draws Bruce Wayne to return to Gotham along with Alfred and Robin (John Blake). A Government Agency lead by Amanda Waller and Tiffany Fox to capture Superman for his part in the Metropolis destruction but Lex Luthor partners with the Joker in their plan to turn The Dark Knight against The Man Of Steel.
